facets.description: A double-delimited string of key/value pairs representing the refinements that were applied if this list is displayed using the Filter By Group component.

items.description: An array of objects representing items displayed to a user.
An object describing a single product displayed to a user.

item_list_id.description: The computer-readable machine name of the list the item showed up in (if sent with a view_item_list event). Use UUID provided by the component if no more specific ID is available.

item_list_name.description: The human-readable name of the item list the item showed up in. If one is not available, populate with numerical index of which list this is on the page (1-indexed).

list_type.description: The type of list the item was found in.

search_term.description: The final search term submitted after any correction has been performed. Only set if the list_type is search_results.

search_type.description: The type of search performed. Only set if the list_type is search_results.
